channel.title: About me on kasesag's personal home page
channel.description: Recent content in About me on kasesag's personal home page

item.title: Deprecating Discord
item.description: Starting from the 1st of May, I will remove my Discord username/tag from my personal home page. Furthermore, I will not accept any future friend requests since they will be disabled.

item.title: Connecting to eduroam Wifi on modern Linux distributions
item.description: If you’re a university student and a Linux user, you already know what’s eduroam and have experienced the pain when it came to the configuration.

item.title: Hello world!
